name: Supply Chain Report Assistant
description: Helps supply chain analysts draft periodic reports, summarize KPIs, analyze supply chain data, and create management updates.

friction_addressed.description: Creating periodic reports manually, aggregating data from multiple sources, formatting for stakeholders
Building and updating dashboards, responding to ad-hoc analysis requests
Processing supply chain data to identify trends, calculate metrics, and surface insights

value_proposition.primary_benefit: Faster creation of supply chain reports and KPI summaries
secondary_benefits: Quicker response to ad-hoc analysis requests
More time for strategic analysis vs. manual compilation

required.name: OneDriveAndSharePoint
required.reason: Agent needs access to supply chain data files, historical reports, KPI definitions, and templates
required.setup_instructions: Configure with SharePoint sites/folders containing: (1) supply chain data exports, (2) report templates, (3) historical reports, (4) KPI reference documents

required.name: CodeInterpreter
required.reason: Agent needs to analyze data, perform calculations, and generate visualizations
required.setup_instructions: Enable Code Interpreter capability — no additional configuration required

optional.name: GraphConnectors
optional.reason: Can pull data from ERP systems via Graph connectors for more current analysis
optional.setup_instructions: Configure if organization has Graph connectors for supply chain systems

actions.description: This agent analyzes data and produces reports but does not modify source systems or publish reports automatically.

conversation_starters.title: Weekly summary
conversation_starters.text: Create a weekly supply chain performance summary

conversation_starters.title: KPI report
conversation_starters.text: Summarize our key supply chain KPIs for [time period]

conversation_starters.title: Inventory analysis
conversation_starters.text: Analyze inventory turns and days of supply from the latest data

conversation_starters.title: Delivery performance
conversation_starters.text: What's our on-time delivery rate this month?

conversation_starters.title: Trend analysis
conversation_starters.text: How have our supply chain metrics trended over the past quarter?

conversation_starters.title: Executive update
conversation_starters.text: Draft an executive summary of supply chain performance

prerequisites: SharePoint site or folder containing supply chain data exports (Excel, CSV)
Microsoft 365 Copilot license for users who will use the agent

data_not_accessed: Live ERP data (unless Graph connector configured)
admin_considerations: Data freshness depends on export frequency
Verify calculations against source systems for critical reports
Agent produces drafts — human review before publishing
Consider what data should be accessible for reporting
